更多的屏幕时间，压力更多？研究链接设备用于青少年心理健康研究表明，过度的屏幕时间有助于青少年的压力和抑郁，这突出了对平衡数字习惯和运动的需求。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/more-screen time-more-more-stress-study-links-links-device-device-use-to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to to-to-to-to-to-to-to-toen-enteral-health.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/more-screen time-more-stres-stress-stress-links-links-device-device-device-use-to-to-toen-mental-mental-health.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=654CDC06-6D8A-4143-BCE2-69EF253D2689 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 05:04:00 -0500 More screen time, more stress? Study links device use to teen mental health

通过选择生活方式来防止结直肠癌证据很明显 - 筛查结直肠癌可能会挽救自己的生命。如今，越来越多的人选择结直肠癌筛查。结果，从结直肠癌中丧生和死亡的老年人数量稳步下降。在过去几年中，美国人的吸烟率也降低了下降。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/preventing-colorectal-colorectal-cancer-cancer-though-lifestyle-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/preventing-coleorcolorectal-cancer-cancer-through-lifestyle-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=5E0F963E-A8A1-42CD-9151-FC7F5380BE18 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 04:10:29 -0500 Preventing colorectal cancer through lifestyle choices

科学家使用zwittions来防止医疗设备中的血液凝结zwtrions听起来喜欢Twitter（X）的远方表亲，但实际上它们是在人类细胞中发现的常见大分子。现在，悉尼大学的科学家也正在使用zwittions来创建可以阻止血凝块在医疗设备和植入物中形成的材料。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/scientists-use-zwitterions-to-to-prevent-blood-clotting-clotting in-Medical-devices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/scientists-use-zwitterions-to-to-prevent-blood-clotting-clotting-in-medical-devices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=7fed8C6B-6571-4840-A091-D8BEF19CA4E0 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 04:06:04 -0500 Scientists use Zwitterions to prevent blood clotting in medical devices
研究表明了多发性硬化症的新治疗方法的希望小鼠中的海绵状植入物有助于指导一种类似于人类多发性硬化症的变性状况减慢或停止退化状况的治疗。它还使密歇根大学的研究人员首先研究了主要的渐进性多发性硬化症，即疾病最快的疾病版本如何在早期攻击中枢神经系统。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/study-shows-promise-promise-for-new-wareatment-papphack-for-for-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/study-shows-promise-formise-for-new-wareatment-wareatment-apprace-for-for-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=31193843-FA89-4CBE-86B3-A1A86EA4B160 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 04:05:07 -0500 Study shows promise for new treatment approach for multiple sclerosis

娱乐活动，而不是工作活动，与较低的2型糖尿病风险有关研究人员发现，无论职业体育锻炼如何，在休闲时间进行中等至剧烈的体育锻炼都与2型糖尿病的风险降低有关。久坐的休闲活动和苛刻的职业活动的结合可能会增加风险。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/recreational-eccise-not-work-work-activity-to-lower-to-lower-type-2-diabetes-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/recreational-eccise-not-work-work-activity-to-lower-to-lower-type-2-diape-2-diabetes-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f1C1E19-BBCD-4739-9DF4-FA1286E3BD09 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 00:45:55 -0500 Recreational exercise, not work activity, linked to lower type 2 diabetes risk
了解当天乳腺癌诊断的差异尽管在乳房X线照片异常之后，尽管对不同种族和族裔的妇女进行了类似的诊断技术，但实际上在当日诊断服务和活检中发现了显着差异，但在乳房X线照片异常后发现了差异。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/understanding-disparities-in-same-same-day-breast-cancer-diarostics.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20250219/understanding-disparities-in-same-same-day-breast-cancer-diarostics.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=A67696F7-C186-48A8A8-B19A-B19A-B4A911BF6016 Wed, 19 Feb 2025 00:31:51 -0500 Understanding disparities in same-day breast cancer diagnostics
